# tf.estimator.ModeKeys

### `class tf.estimator.ModeKeys`



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/estimator/model_fn.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/python/estimator/model_fn.py).

Standard names for model modes.

The following standard keys are defined:

* `TRAIN`: training mode.
* `EVAL`: evaluation mode.
* `PREDICT`: inference mode.
